body: Once each day, you can emit a 20-foot aura for a number of rounds equal to your cleric level. Allies within the aura gain a +2 deflection bonus to AC and combat maneuver defense.
name: Deflection Aura
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Cleric/Subdomains/Defense Subdomain/Replacement Power/Deflection Aura
